Html:
Hi,

I'm using WPF toolkit datagrid and I have a cell I would like it to be disabled when a checkbox is true..

How can you do this? (I can't seem to find the IsEnable property)

Thanks in advance

Hi RuiLopes,

Every control derived from UIElement has an IsEnabled property. You will have to set it using CellStyle property defined on DataGrid or DataGridColumn.

Thanks for your input VamseeP..

Glad to know it can be done..

do you have any code example of that? or can you point me to a link ehre I can find it?

thanks in advance

Hi there,

Does anybody have an idea how to do this?

I really need this...

Any help/idea is mostly appreciated...

Thanks in advance

I think  this would helps you.
dg:DataGridCheckBoxColumn >
                            <dg:DataGridCheckBoxColumn.EditingElementStyle>
                                <Style TargetType="CheckBox">

                                    <Style.Triggers>
                                        <Trigger Property="IsChecked" Value="False">
                                         
                                            <Setter Property="IsEnabled" Value="False" />
                                       
                                        </Trigger>
                                        <Trigger Property="IsChecked" Value="True">
                                            <Setter Property="IsEnabled" Value="True" />
                                          
                                        </Trigger>
                                    </Style.Triggers>
                                </Style>
                            </dg:DataGridCheckBoxColumn.EditingElementStyle>

                        </dg:DataGridCheckBoxColumn>
